description: This award provides money to recognize the winner of Political Science paper submissions. There will be a graduate and undergraduate paper winner. Winners will be the department's representative for the Oklahoma Political Science association Paper Award competitions in the fall. Eligibility Requirements Graduate Student Political Science major Attach Political Science Paper

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
